Mon, 10 Feb 2025 03:00:00 +0000 (From left): US President Donald Trump is joined by SoftBank chief executive Masayoshi Son and OpenAI chief executive Sam Altman at an event touting a $100 billion venture in artificial intelligence infrastructure at the White House in Washington on Tuesday, January 21, 2025. Openly questioning the administration he now serves, Elon Musk cast doubt on Trump's announcement, saying the so-called Stargate venture did not have the financing to achieve the promised investment levels. Photo / Haiyun Jiang / The New York Times
